verses.verse: Then the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me saying,<WH559>

"Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> prophesy<WH5012> against<WH413> the prophets<WH5030> of Israel<WH3478> who prophesy,<WH5012> and say<WH559> to those who prophesy<WH5030> from their own inspiration,<WH3820> 'Listen<WH8085> to the word<WH1697> of the Lord!<WH3068>

'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> "Woe<WH1945> to the foolish<WH5036> prophets<WH5030> who<WH834> are following<WH1980> <WH310> their own spirit<WH7307> and have seen<WH7200> nothing.<WH1115>
"O Israel,<WH3478> your prophets<WH5030> have been<WH1961> like foxes<WH7776> among ruins.<WH2723>

"You have not gone<WH5927> up into the breaches,<WH6556> nor<WH3808> did you build<WH1443> the wall<WH1443> around<WH5921> the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> to stand<WH5975> in the battle<WH4421> on the day<WH3117> of the Lord.<WH3068>

"They see<WH2372> falsehood<WH7723> and lying<WH3577> divination<WH7081> who are saying,<WH559> 'The Lord<WH3068> declares,<WH5002> 'when the Lord<WH3068> has not sent<WH7971> them; yet they hope<WH3176> for the fulfillment<WH6965> of [their] word.<WH1697>

"Did you not see<WH7200> a false<WH7723> vision<WH4236> and speak<WH559> a lying<WH3577> divination<WH4738> when you said,<WH559> 'The Lord<WH3068> declares,<WH5002> 'but it is not I who have spoken<WH1696>?"' "

Therefore,<WH3651> thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> "Because<WH3282> you have spoken<WH1696> falsehood<WH7723> and seen<WH2372> a lie,<WH3577> therefore<WH3651> behold,<WH2009> I am against<WH413> you," declares<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> God.<WH3068>

"So My hand<WH3027> will be against<WH413> the prophets<WH5030> who see<WH7200> false<WH7723> visions<WH7723> and utter<WH7080> lying<WH3577> divinations.<WH7080> They will have<WH1961> no<WH3808> place<WH1961> in the council<WH5475> of My people,<WH5971> nor<WH3808> will they be written<WH3789> down<WH3789> in the register<WH3791> of the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> nor<WH3808> will they enter<WH935> the land<WH127> of Israel,<WH3478> that you may know<WH3045> that I am the Lord<WH136> God.<WH3068>

"It is definitely<WH3282> because<WH3282> they have misled<WH2937> My people<WH5971> by saying,<WH559> 'Peace!<WH7965>' when there<WH369> is no<WH369> peace.<WH7965> And when anyone<WH1931> builds<WH1129> a wall,<WH2434> behold,<WH2009> they plaster<WH2902> it over<WH2902> with whitewash;<WH9648>

[so] tell<WH559> those who plaster<WH2902> it over<WH2902> with whitewash,<WH9648> that it will fall.<WH5307> A flooding<WH7857> rain<WH1653> will come,<WH1961> and you, O hailstones,<WH417> <WH68> will fall;<WH5307> and a violent<WH9370> wind<WH7307> will break<WH1234> out.
"Behold,<WH2009> when the wall<WH7023> has fallen,<WH5307> will you not be asked,<WH559> 'Where<WH346> is the plaster<WH2915> with which<WH834> you plastered<WH2902> [it]?'"

Therefore,<WH3651> thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> "I will make a violent<WH9370> wind<WH7307> break<WH1234> out in My wrath.<WH2534> There will also be in My anger<WH639> a flooding<WH7857> rain<WH1653> and hailstones<WH417> <WH68> to consume<WH3615> [it] in wrath.<WH2534>

"So I shall tear<WH2040> down<WH2040> the wall<WH7023> which<WH834> you plastered<WH2902> over<WH2902> with whitewash<WH9648> and bring<WH5060> it down<WH5060> to the ground,<WH776> so that its foundation<WH3247> is laid<WH1540> bare;<WH1540> and when it falls,<WH5307> you will be consumed<WH3615> in its midst.<WH8432> And you will know<WH3045> that I am the Lord.<WH3068>

"Thus I shall spend<WH3615> My wrath<WH2534> on the wall<WH7023> and on those who have plastered<WH2902> it over<WH2902> with whitewash;<WH9648> and I shall say<WH559> to you, 'The wall<WH7023> is gone<WH369> and its plasterers<WH2902> are gone,<WH369>

[along with] the prophets<WH5030> of Israel<WH3478> who prophesy<WH5012> to Jerusalem,<WH3389> and who see<WH7200> visions<WH2377> of peace<WH7965> for her when there<WH369> is no<WH369> peace,<WH7965>' declares<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> God.<WH3068>

"Now you, son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> set<WH7760> your face<WH6440> against<WH413> the daughters<WH1323> of your people<WH5971> who are prophesying<WH5012> from their own inspiration.<WH3820> Prophesy<WH5012> against<WH5921> them,

and say,<WH559> 'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> "Woe<WH1945> to the women who sew<WH8609> [magic] bands<WH3704> on all<WH3605> wrists,<WH3027> <WH679> and make<WH6213> veils<WH4555> for the heads<WH7218> of [persons] of every<WH3605> stature<WH6967> to hunt<WH6679> down<WH6679> lives!<WH5315> Will you hunt<WH6679> down<WH6679> the lives<WH5315> of My people,<WH5971> but preserve<WH2421> the lives<WH5315> [of others] for yourselves?

"And for handfuls<WH8168> of barley<WH8184> and fragments<WH9465> of bread,<WH3899> you have profaned<WH2490> Me to My people<WH5971> to put<WH4191> to death<WH4191> some<WH5315> who<WH834> should not die<WH4191> and to keep<WH2421> others<WH5315> alive<WH2421> who<WH834> should not live,<WH2421> by your lying<WH3576> to My people<WH5971> who listen<WH8085> to lies.<WH3577>"' "

Therefore,<WH3651> thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> "Behold,<WH2009> I am against<WH413> your [magic] bands<WH3704> by which<WH834> you hunt<WH6679> lives<WH5315> there<WH8033> as birds,<WH9458> and I will tear<WH7167> them off<WH4480> <WH5921> your arms;<WH2220> and I will let<WH7971> them go,<WH7971> even<WH853> those lives<WH5315> whom<WH834> you hunt<WH6679> as birds.<WH9458>

"I will also tear<WH7167> off your veils<WH4555> and deliver<WH5337> My people<WH5971> from your hands,<WH3027> and they will no<WH3808> longer<WH5750> be in your hands<WH3027> to be hunted;<WH9287> and you will know<WH3045> that I am the Lord.<WH3068>

"Because<WH3282> you disheartened<WH3512> the righteous<WH6662> with falsehood<WH8267> when I did not cause<WH3510> him grief,<WH3510> but have encouraged<WH2388> <WH3027> the wicked<WH7563> not to turn<WH7725> from his wicked<WH7451> way<WH1870> [and] preserve<WH2421> his life,<WH2421>

therefore,<WH3651> you women will no<WH3808> longer<WH5750> see<WH7200> false<WH7723> visions<WH7723> or practice<WH7080> divination,<WH7081> and I will deliver<WH5337> My people<WH5971> out of your hand.<WH3027> Thus you will know<WH3045> that I am the Lord.<WH3068> "
